attributes.action: Build a cinema and a bowling alley in Dumfries
attributes.additional_details: It would improve the economic status of Dumfries as a whole if more entertainment was added to the town. There is a big open lot in the city centre that used to be Debenhams that could be used. It will raise morale in the town and bring in more tourism. It would also offer more employment.
attributes.background: We would like to propose a cinema and a bowling alley to be opened in Dumfries city centre. There are a lot of empty buildings throughout Dumfries which could be used to house both of these venues.

rejection.details:
Decisions about local planning decisions are a matter for individual local authorities, not the Government or House of Commons. As a result it is not possible for the Government or House of Commons to take the action you have requested.

If you are interested in planning decisions in your area you could raise this with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
